item.description: Martin-Louis Bright email: mlbright@gmail.com LinkedIn.com: https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinbright/ Toronto, Ontario, Canada Summary I am a highly adaptable, consummate, self-driven, and bilingual (English/French) information technology professional with over 20 years experience in a variety of settings including software development, health care, entertainment, and higher education. Embracing devops culture and practices, I have a track record of successfully using programming and system administration skills to provide effective solutions to IT problems.
